profile.title: Baro kɔnɔ kalan (Usera denw)
profile.mustLogin: I ka sigi ka don ka sɛbɛn kɛ fɛ ka lajɛ walasa.
profile.autoTranslate: Kan ka fɛɛnɛ kɛ a bolo (taamala ka ta)
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Original ni fɛɛnɛ ka ɲɔgɔn kɔrɔ
profile.filterExplicit: Jɛgɛjɛgɛ min bɛ niɛ sisan minnu (kɛrɛnkɛrɛn)
profile.enableReadReceipts: Ka kalan don tugu (read receipts) kɛ
profile.allowExplicitContent: Jɛgɛjɛgɛ min bɛ ka sɔrɔ ɲɔgɔn
profile.avatarError: Avatar tölö b’a kɛ ka suma
profile.noPrivateKey: Private key tɛ ni a fɛ ko bɛ eksporti.
profile.importSuccess: Private key da dɛmɛra a mɛni kɔnɔ.
profile.importFailed: Key ka dɛmɛ tɛ se (hakilijɛ tɛ bɛɛ se walima faili b’i jɔ).
profile.keysRotated: Kɛy kɔrɔw da tɔ, key kelen-kelen kura da sɔrɔ ni public key da tölöra.
profile.keyDisclaimer: I ka private key tɛ bɛ na a bɔ n’a mɛn. I bɛ se ka a eksporti ni hakilijɛ la walasa i bɛ se ka a dɛmɛ a ciden kan.
profile.themeFreeNotice: I bɛ Free la—Sun/Moon minnu sisan ɲɛ bɛ kɛ. Upgrade k’a bɔ ka tɛmɛ kɛ.
profile.backupTitle: Encrypted Backup ni Jɔlɔ dɛmɛ (Device Sync)
profile.backupDesc: I bɛ se ka backup kɛ ni hakilijɛ la, ka a dɛmɛ jɔlɔ wɛrɛ kan walasa ka sɛnki kɛ.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: App tɛ fɔlɔ ye o tuma, ka blur kɛ
profile.holdToReveal: A la kan ka sisan (hold) walasa ka ɲini ɲɛ
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ka y’a fɔ n ye ni ne baro da kopi yɛrɛ
profile.followHint: Nin mɔgɔ la storyw bɛ na i ɲɛ ‘Following’ kɔnɔ i ka fɔlɔw bɛ bɔ ‘Followers’ walima ‘Public’ ma.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Fɛn min na, ɲɛ na a kɔnɔ la.
profile.forwarding: Sɔn ni Baro ka ɲɛ fɔ (Forwarding)
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Kɔli ni sɔrɔw ka fɔ i ka telefɔni walima email min bɛ sɔrɔ sariya. I ka kɔli/sɔrɔw min bɛ na, bɛ se ka Chatforia nimɔrɔ bɔ a la ɲɛ.

chat.selectPrompt: Sɔrɔ sɔrɔwalin walima chatroom fili walasa ka baro daminɛ
chat.emptySubtitle: Baro kelen t’a sɔrɔ walasa ka chat daminɛ.

status.captionLabel: Mun bɛ i ka hakili kɔnɔ?
status.audienceLabel: Mɔgɔw minnu bɛ se ka ɲɛ (Audience)

sidebar.loginPrompt: Sigi ka i ka setɛnminnu bɛɛ sɛbɛn.

premium.heading: Ka taa Premium la
premium.description: Fɛn tɛmɛw ka bɔ ni ads bɔ.

auth.headline: Sutura bɛ bɔ, jɛmanbaro bɛ bɔ ni ka kan fɛɛnɛ sisan
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, AI ka fɛɛnɛ, baro bɛ bɔ, ni kɔli/kalan (voice/video).

feature.disappearing: Baro bɛ bɔ ni read receipts
feature.privacy: Sutura bɛ fɛ. I ka don, i ka hakɛ.

auth.welcomeBack: I ni sɔgɔma k’a na (Welcome back)
auth.keepSignedIn: Ka ne siga sigilen (Stay signed in)
auth.desktopTip: Sɛbɛnkan kɔnɔ? I ka telefon ka skani walasa app ka sɔrɔ.

headlineAlt.main: Sutura ka barokan ɲɛ min ye

auth.subhead: Sutura bɛ bɔ, encrypti bɛ bɔ, ni fɛɛnɛ sisan — sisan na.
auth.tip: I bɛ se ka Chatforia bɔ minnu la—walima app da sɔrɔ walasa ka dɛmɛ bɛɛ sɔrɔ.
auth.scanHint: Skani walasa app da sɔrɔ walima i ka sɛbɛnkan kɔnɔ ka bɔ.

footer.doNotSell: A bɛ nye sira ra don tɛ (Do Not Sell My Info)

home.title: Home
home.subheader: Baro kelen da walasa chat daminɛ.
home.welcomeMessage: I ni tile ka di Chatforia la

press.title: Press
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ye sutura barokan ye ni fɛɛnɛ sisan ni E2E encryption, a bɛ dɛmɛ ka dunia barokan bɛɛ kɛ sutura ni fɛn kɔfɛ.
press.assetsText: Logo, sɔrɔw, ni product ɲɛta (bɛ na sisan).

careers.title: Barokeneya
careers.intro: An ye ɲɛgɛn ka ɲɔgɔn ye ka sutura barokan dɔ. Ni i b’a fɛ encryption, sɛgbɛya, ni UX min dɛmɛ, o la an bɛ fo i la.
careers.openRoles: Fɔlɔ fɛɛnɔɔrɔw: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Ka ka taa: I ka CV/links ka tölö ɲɔgɔntɔ: jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Chatforia kan
about.description: Chatforia ye sutura, kanw di barokan ye ni end-to-end encryption, fɛɛnɛ sisan, ni kɔli/video. An ka ka fɛ ye kelen ye: mɔgɔw ka fɛ kɔnɔ—sutura la, hakɛ la, ni kanw bɛɛ ɲɔgɔn.

values.access: Se ka bɔ bɛɛ ma: Kan ka fɛɛnɛ 100+ kan.
values.control: Ka dɔɔni: Baro bɛ bɔ ni read receipts ma i ka sago la.

about.howTitle: N’i ka kɛjɔ min bɛ kɛ
about.howDescription: Barow bɛ encrypti i ka jɔlɔ kɔnɔ k’a taa. Fɛɛnɛ, backup, ni jɔlɔ sɛnki bɛ na k’a jiginya ka ɲɔgɔn an ka sèrèw ma.

advertise.title: Annonce kɛ ni Chatforia
advertise.description: An bɛ dilan barokɛlaw la ni bannɛri min bɛ ɲɛ, brand-safe. An bɛ di sponsorshipw, ni an ka dɔw. Premium sɛbɛnkan mɔgɔw t’a di ads.

adsense.withPubId: An bɛ di Google AdSense la sisan. Ni i b’a fɛ ka an ɲɛ bɔ Google Ads la, bɔ publisher ID {{pubId}} ni ma ‘managed placement’ an ka unitw la. Sponsorshipw bɛ na—form ka bɔ.
adsense.noPubId: An bɛ di Google AdSense la sisan. Sponsorshipw bɛ na—form ka bɔ.

advertise.noPlacements: Placement tɛ setɛnna sisan. Ka a lajɛ ads/placements.js kɔnɔ.

why.highSession: Session bɛ nyini-jɔ ni waati dɔrɔn chat UI kɔnɔ
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments bɛ se (misali, “Start a Chat” modal)
why.deals: Direct deals walima programmatic via AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: I ni ce! I ka ɲɛta bɛ na. An bɛ ka kɔfɛ sisan kɔfɛ.
form.missingRequired: Ka tɔgɔ, email, ni baro kɔnɔ ka dɔ.
form.successToast: I ni ce! An bɛ k’a fɔ ka kɔfɛ.
form.mailtoInfo: I ka email client bɛ bɔ ka ɲɛta tölö…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ka tölö na, i b’a bila an ka

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Plan min bɛ i ɲɛ: Plus bɛ b’a to ads bɔ, Premium bɛ b’a di fɛn tɛmɛw bɛɛ.

features.ringtones: Ringtone ni saba min i b’a fe

features.sameFeatures: Fɛn tɛmɛw bɛɛ tan ni Monthly

gettingStarted.title: Daminɛ kɛ
gettingStarted.subtitle: I t’a dɔ Chatforia la? Nin dɔgɔkun bɛ na walasa i ka daminɛ sisan-sisan.

alert.text: Nin gidi bɛ ka tɛmɛ ni an bɛ la jatebɔw kɛ. Ni fɛn ma sɔrɔ, i ka

section1.title: 1) I ka kɔrɔsi kɛ
section1.loginText: i ka kɔrɔsi min bɛ sɔrɔ la.

section2.title: 2) Baro daminɛ
section2.item1: DM walima Group kɛ, ka baro kelen na.
section2.item2: Kan ka fɛɛnɛ sisan bɛ dɛmɛ ka kanw 100+ la baro kɛ.
section2.item3: Profile → Privacy kɔnɔ, baro bɛ bɔ ni read receipts ɲɛ.

section3.title: 3) Ka taa ɲɔgɔn
section3.item1Part2: jama kɔnɔ (Plus = ads tɛ, Premium = fɛn tɛmɛw bɛɛ).
section3.item2Part1: Jɔlɔw wɛrɛ kɔrɔsi ni encrypted backup setɛn

account.q: I bɛ se kɔrɔsi kɛ walima kɔrɔsi dɛmɛ wa?
account.a: App da sɔrɔ walima web bɛ, bɔ “Create account”, email/telefɔni ka verifi. Dɛmɛ walasa, “Forgot password” bɔ.

privacy.a: Awɔ. Baro ni kɔli bɛ end-to-end encrypti ɲɛ. I ni a ɲɔgɔn ye bɛ se ka a kalan.

translate.q: Kan ka fɛɛnɛ sisan bɛ kɛ dɛmɛ ɲɛ wa?
translate.a: Settings → Appearance & Language kɔnɔ “Auto-translate” bɔ. A bɛ kɛ jɔlɔ kɔnɔ min bɛ se, walima API sutura minnu la baara kɛ ni sɛbɛn kɔfɛ dɔ.

contact.a: Email: support@chatforia.com. Sɔrɔw ni i ka app version ka tölö.

contact.title: Kontaki an
contact.successMsg: I ni ce—an ka team bɛ i ma jawa ni email la.

intro.body: Nin Privacy Policy bɛ ka fɔ i ma i na, Chatforia (“an”, “an ma”) bɛ ni fɛn minnu bɛ ka sɔrɔ, bɛ kelen, bɛ sɛbɛn kɛ ni i bɛ an ka appw ni sèrèw bɛ kɔ. An bɛ dɛsigine Chatforia walasa ka an ma don ɲɔgɔn ka dɔn dɔ.

infoWeCollect.title: Fɛn minnu an bɛ sɔrɔ
infoWeCollect.account: Kɔrɔsi fɛn (misali, email/telefɔni) walasa kɔrɔsi ka kɛ ni an ka sèrè ka ɲɛ.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (baro/kɔli) ye end-to-end encrypti ye; an tɛ se ka a kalan.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostiki/baara minnu bɛ kɛ ni crash log, jɔlɔ ka dɔ, walima analitikisi dɔ walasa performansi ka ɲɛ.

howWeUse.title: Ka fɛn minnu bɛ kɛ walasa
howWeUse.provide: Sèrè ka bɔ ni a ka sɛbɛn (auth, spam/abuse ka fisa).
howWeUse.improve: Fɛnw ka nyɛ (kan ka fɛɛnɛ ɲɛ, jɔliya).
howWeUse.legal: Dɔnniya kalo minnu bɛ na la ka bɛɛn.

sharing.title: Ka fɛn minnu bɔ ɲɔgɔn
sharing.body: An t’a sɔɔrɔ nyɛja bɔra. An bɛ bɔ fɛn dɔ k’u yɛrɛw ma (misali, push, analitikisi) ni kontraw kɛrɛnkɛrɛn la.

rights.title: I ka hakɛw
rights.body: I ka dugukolo (misali GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA) na, i bɛ se ka lajɛ, ka ɲɛgɛnni, ka bɔ, walima fɛn dɔw la ta. Kontaki: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Don ka minɛnni & hakɛ
retention.body: An bɛ dɔ fɛn dɔ kelen kelen walasa sèrè ka bɔ, ni security sariya kɛ. E2E content tɛ se ka an na ka b’a kalan.

children.title: Dɛnmisɛn
children.body: Chatforia tɛ bɔ dɛnmisɛn minnu bɛ minɛn 13 kan (walima i dugukolo ka kalo na).

changes.title: Caman
changes.body: An bɛ ɲɛsiw ka bɔ nin kɔnɔ, ‘K’a cɛ’ ka dɔ.

intro.body: Ni i b’a kɛ Chatforia la, i b’a jija nin Termw ma. Ni i tɛ ɲɔgɔn, i tɛ se ka sèrè bɔ.

accounts.title: Kɔrɔsiw
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ka fɛn dɔ bɔ min b’a ɲɛ ni hakilijɛ ka sɛbɛn feere kɛ.
accounts.itemResponsibility: I bɛ sago i ka kɔrɔsi ka baara bɛɛ la.

acceptableUse.title: Baa kɛrɛnkɛrɛnbali
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Fɛn tɛna dɔ, jɛgɛjɛgɛ tɛ, walima fɛn min bɛ dɔrɔn kɛ tɛ; spam tɛ, automatisɛ abuuzu tɛ.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: An bɛ se ka ka sigi/sanba ni sariya bɛ bɔ.

yourContent.title: I ka content
yourContent.body: I bɛ kɔnɔ i ka content la hakɛ. I bɛ di an ma hakɛ min bɛ sariya walasa sèrè ka kɛ (misali, routing, jɛli, fɛɛnɛ).

disclaimer.title: Fɔlɔ ni kɛlɛw (Disclaimers & liability)
disclaimer.body: Sèrè b’a na ‘as is’ kɔnɔ. Nin dɔnna bɛɛ la, Chatforia tɛ dɔɔnin baara bɛɛ la ka fɔ a la kɛlɛ la (indirect/consequential) tɛ.

changes.title: Caman
changes.body: An bɛ nin termw ɲɛsi; ka bali ɲɛsi kɔfɛ ka sèrè kɛ t’a la ɲɛsi min na la.

doNotSell.title: A bɛ n ye don tɛ walima n na ɲɛbɔ tɛ
doNotSell.body: Chatforia tɛ n ye personal don na. California mɔgɔw bɛ se k’a ɲini CPRA la walasa nin bɔton min na.

cookies.title: Cookie setɛnminnu
cookies.body: Chatforia bɛ cookie dɔ ye dɔɔni dɔ (misali, session, hakɛ). An t’a di ads cookiew t’a la. Cookiew ka kan i ka sɛbɛnkan setɛnminnu kɔnɔ.
